Get help
========

If you need help with any aspect of Arasea, let us know! We would be happy to hear from you.

Bugs and feature requests
-------------------------

.. tip::
   Take a look at the :ref:`troubleshoot` section if you are encountering difficulties with Arasea.

Report bugs on GitHub on the Arasea `Issues page <https://github.com/arasea-devs/arasea/issues>`__. You can post feature requests on the `Discussions page <https://github.com/arasea-devs/arasea/discussions>`__.

Help using Arasea
-----------------

Donâ€™t know how to do X with Arasea? Start a `discussion <https://github.com/arasea-devs/arasea/discussions>`__ on GitHub.

Community
---------

For real-time feedback or more general chat about Arasea, join the `Discord server <https://discord.gg/h3sjmPYuGJ>`__ or the `Gitter room <https://gitter.im/arasea-devs/arasea>`__ to connect with the Arasea community.
